      • getNumberOfCoursesRegistered

        int getNumberOfCoursesRegistered​(Student student)
        Gets the number of courses a student has registered for.
        Parameters:
        student - Student object of the student ot query for
        Returns:
        number of courses

      • selectCourse

        void selectCourse​(Student student,
                  int courseId)
        Registers a student for a particular course
        Parameters:
        student - Student to register the course for.
        courseId - CourseID of the course being selected by the student

      • dropCourse

        void dropCourse​(Course course,
                Student student)
         throws CourseNotFoundException
        drops a course for a student
        Parameters:
        course - course to drop
        student - Student for whom the course is to be dropped
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if No such course exists

      • viewRegisteredCourses

        void viewRegisteredCourses​(Student student)
        displays all courses the student has registered for.
        Parameters:
        student - The student for whom to query for.

      • viewReportCard

        void viewReportCard​(Student student)
        Displays student report card
        Parameters:
        student - Student whose report card is to be displayed

      • getTotalFee

        int getTotalFee​(Student student)
        Gets total fees the student needs to pay or has paid.
        Parameters:
        student - The student whose fees needs to be queried
        Returns:
        The calculated fees

      • makePayment

        boolean makePayment​(Student student,
                    int paymentMethod,
                    int fees)
        Pays student fees.
        Parameters:
        student - The student making the payment
        paymentMethod - Mode of payment selected
        fees - Total fees being paid
        Returns:
        True if payment was successful, else false
